name: Rosée Pasta
description: Bring a touch of gourmet to your table without all the fuss! This recipe will be your “go-to” dinner solution for busy weeknights. Throw in some cooked chicken or seafood and a medley of veggies for some extra flair (and nutrition!).
preparation: In a saucepan, combine sauce mix with milk and tomato paste. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking constantly. Reduce heat to low and simmer 3 min or until thickened.
Or, in a 4-cup microwavable bowl, combine sauce mix with milk and tomato paste; whisk to combine. Microwave on high 4–5 min or until thickened, whisking halfway through.
To serve, combine prepared sauce with your choice of cooked pasta.

nutritionalInformation.servingSize: about 1/4 cup prepared sauce and 3/4 cup cooked pasta

tips: For best results, store and reheat leftover pasta and sauce separately; toss together after reheating.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup steamed veggies.
